subject: Guest pitch: Nearly 10 years documenting copy trading on eToro
body:
Hi,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog. I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016 and have 335 YouTube videos documenting the journey.

I'd love to be a guest on Trading Nut. My angle:

- Nearly 10 years of real-money copy trading, filmed and documented
- The psychology of trusting someone else with your money
- What separates traders worth copying from the ones who look good on paper but blow up
- Honest talk about whether copy trading can work as a long-term strategy

I'm not selling anything â€” just sharing nearly a decade of real experience. Happy to chat about format and topics.

Cheers,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://youtube.com/socialtrading
